subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: David Toms, seeking his first PGA Tour victory in five years, birdied two of his last three holes to surge into a four-way tie for the lead at the Mayakoba Classic on Thursday.
snippet: David Toms, seeking his first PGA Tour victory in five years, birdied two of his last three holes to surge into a four-way tie for the lead at the Mayakoba Classic on Thursday.
